sentence.text: LETM1 protein was detected in 107 TNBC, 42 ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) and 65 adjacent non-tumor breast tissues using immunohistochemical (IHC) staining.
The strongly positive rate of LETM1 in TNBC was 69.2% (74/107), which was significantly higher than in both DCIS 35.7% (15/42) and adjacent non-tumor tissues 12.3% (8/65).
